decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers:  - 1776-41 Proposed Side Elevations, - 1776-42 Proposed Outbuilding Plans, - 1776-43 Proposed Outbuilding Elevations and - 1776-44 Site Plan of New Outbuilding
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning
| All external materials to be used in the development shall be consistent with those listed within the submitted application form and the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Development Management DPD (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 1.1 (g), 2.1 (c) and 2.10 of the Adopted Core Strategy (2012).

| The outbuilding shall only be used for domestic purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the dwelling, at no.101 Gonville Cres. and not for any separate residential, industrial, commercial or business use. No kitchen or cooking facilities shall be installed at any time.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties, in accordance with the National Planning Policy Framework 2023 (Updated) - section 12, Council's adopted Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) policies 7.4 and 7B, policies 1.1 (g) of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and policies D1, D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021).
| No part of the roof of the outbuilding shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D4 and D6 of The London Plan (2021), policy DAA of the Ealing local Plan (Reg.19), policy 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and policies 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Core Strategy (2012)
description: Single storey detached garden outbuilding to be used as gym and storage area
